mapper.select: SELECT PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_TABLE_DESC('01',a.MD_CTABLENAME,'ja') as description, a.MD_CTABLENAME as name FROM (SELECT DISTINCT(MD_CTABLENAME),MD_CCUSTOMERID FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND MD_CAVLFORCKSTART = '1') a, MAST_DATADICTBL b WHERE a.MD_CCUSTOMERID = b.MDT_CCUSTOMERID AND a.MD_CTABLENAME = b.MDT_CTABLENAME ORDER BY b.MDT_NTABLESEQ,a.MD_CTABLENAME
